mapper.select: select count(*) from board where b_status='Y'

SELECT B_NO , B_TITLE , B_CONTENT
, B_ENROLL_DATE , B_MODIFY_DATE , M_NO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, NLIST.* FROM( SELECT * FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER_ROLE USING(M_NO) WHERE B_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY B_NO DESC) NLIST ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{ startRow } AND #{ endRow }

SELECT B_NO , B_TITLE , B_CONTENT
, B_ENROLL_DATE , B_COUNT , B_STAR , B_STATUS , M_NO FROM BOARD WHERE B_STATUS='Y' AND B_NO = #{ b_no } ORDER BY B_NO DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LOVIT WHERE B_NO = #{ bno } AND M_NO = #{ mno }
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM LOVIT WHERE M_NO = #{ mno } and B_NO = #{ b_no }

SELECT LR_NO ,L_TITLE ,L_THUMBNAIL ,LR_END_DATE , SUM_B_STAR FROM ( SELECT LR_NO ,SUM(B_STAR) SUM_B_STAR FROM BOARD JOIN LECTURE_REGISTRATION USING(LR_NO) JOIN LECTURE USING (L_NO) where B_ENROLL_DATE between sysdate-2 and sysdate GROUP BY LR_NO ) JOIN LECTURE_REGISTRATION USING(LR_NO) JOIN LECTURE USING(L_NO) where (LR_END_DATE between sysdate-4 and sysdate) AND ROWNUM <=3 ORDER BY 5 DESC
SELECT B_NO ,B_TITLE ,B_CONTENT ,B_STAR ,M_NO ,LR_NO ,L_TITLE ,B_STATUS FROM BOARD JOIN LECTURE_REGISTRATION USING(LR_NO) JOIN LECTURE USING (L_NO) WHERE B_NO= #{ b_no } AND M_NO = #{ mno }
